ygData.messageBody:
Ouch.. if he warrior class can be looked at seriously and improved then
the petiton has served it's purpose. The extent of the change in
relation to what has been proposed is another thing.

I am sure other classes will gripe after the warrior class is looked at
and changed, but that is the nature of change. Once one things change
you have to look and see how it has affected other things.

Just MHO,

Az
